title: More Than An Athlete
description: Cari Champion goes one-on-one with Uninterrupted and SpringHill Entertainment CEO Maverick Carter live at the ninth annual espnW: Women + Sports Summit. Maverick talks about his experience becoming an entrepreneur and working with LeBron James.
itunes:title: More Than An Athlete
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
